mapper.select: select count(*) from medical_registration r join patient_user_info_card c on r.patient_card_id=c.id where c.user_id=#{userId} and r.create_time=STR_TO_DATE('${today}','%Y-%m-%d')

select r.id from medical_registration r join patient_user_info_card c on r.patient_card_id=c.id where c.user_id=#{userId} and date=STR_TO_DATE('${date}','%Y-%m-%d') and dept_sub_id=#{deptSubId} and payment_status !=3 LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: insert into medical_registration(patient_card_id,work_plan_id, doctor_schedule_id,doctor_id, dept_sub_id,date,slot,amount, out_trade_no,prepay_id, payment_status,create_time,status) values (#{patientCardId},#{workPlanId},#{doctorScheduleId},#{doctorId},#{deptSubId}, STR_TO_DATE('${date}','%Y-%m-%d'),#{slot},#{amount},#{outTradeNo},#{prepayId},1,NOW(),1)
mapper.update: update medical_registration set payment_status=4 where out_trade_no=#{outTradeNo} and payment_status=1
mapper.select: select doctor_schedule_id as doctorScheduleId,work_plan_id as workPlanId from medical_rigistration where out_trade_no=#{outTradeNo}
select transaction_id from medical_registration where out_trade_no =#{outTardeNo}

select r.id as id, r.date as date, r.slot as slot, c.name as patientName , s.name as subDeptName, d.name as doctorName, s.location as location, d.job as job, r.out_trade_no as outTradeNo, CAST(r.amount as char) as amount, r.payment_status as paymentStatus, dp.id as prescriptionId from medical_registration r join patient_user_info_card c on r.patient_card_id=c.id join medical_dept_sub s on r.dept_sub_id=s.id join doctor d on d.id=r.doctor_id join doctor_prescription dp on dp.registration_id=r.ide where r.id=#{id} and c.user_id=#{userId}
select * from medical_registration m join patient_user_info_card p on m.patient_card_id=p.id where m.payment_status=2 and m.status=#{status}
